metadata.source: Derived from historical generation (GWh) and capacity (MW) data
metadata.description: Coal power plant capacity factor, calculated as Generation_GWh / (Capacity_MW × 8.76)
Levelized Cost of Energy for coal power plants ($/MWh). Values represent mid-range estimates for operating coal plants including fuel, O&M, and amortized capital costs.
Levelized Cost of Energy for natural gas power plants ($/MWh). Values represent mid-range estimates for CCGT plants including fuel, O&M, and amortized capital costs.
Concentrated Solar Power capacity factor. CSP plants with thermal storage typically achieve 25-40% CF depending on storage hours and location.
